title: How to Get 0 Points in Papa's Hot Doggeria

steps.headline: Know that you already start out with 1 sausage, bun, drink, and snack, so you will need to complete a few days in order to get 1 more sausage and bun type.
steps.description:
Make sure you have these things in the game:
2 types of sausages
2 types of buns
2 types of drinks
2 types of snacks

steps.headline: Decide how you want to achieve your goal of getting 0 points.
steps.description: The next steps will outline the easiest way, however, you can choose any other option you want from the tables below. These tables demonstrate how many points you will get on the 3 stations with different combinations of meat, buns, toppings, drinks, and snacks. The Scoring System, and easiest way to get 0 points, are also on there.

steps.headline: Start the day and wait until all the customers for that day arrive and the shop closes.
When the last one arrives, time about 10 minutes.
steps.description: With this you will make sure that for every customer the waiting score is 0.

steps.headline: Give them a different kind of sausage from what they actually want.
steps.description: If they want normal sausage, put Italian sausage on the griller. If they want Italian sausage, start grilling a normal one. It doesn't matter what type it is, it just has to be a different one to what the customer ordered.

steps.headline: Take off the sausage straight away making sure it is raw.
Put the sausage you just took off the griller in a bun.
steps.description: Again, the bun has to be a different one to what the customer ordered in order to get 0 points. The hot dog will now go to the build station.

steps.headline: Here just press next, don't put anything as a topping.
With the drink if the customer ordered a fizzo, give them nothing.
steps.description: If they didn't order anything, give them a fizzo (doesn't matter what size).

steps.headline: Do the same for the popcorn.

text:
Know that you already start out with 1 sausage, bun, drink, and snack, so you will need to complete a few days in order to get 1 more sausage and bun type. Make sure you have these things in the game:
2 types of sausages
2 types of buns
2 types of drinks
2 types of snacks Decide how you want to achieve your goal of getting 0 points. The next steps will outline the easiest way, however, you can choose any other option you want from the tables below. These tables demonstrate how many points you will get on the 3 stations with different combinations of meat, buns, toppings, drinks, and snacks. The Scoring System, and easiest way to get 0 points, are also on there. Start the day and wait until all the customers for that day arrive and the shop closes.  When the last one arrives, time about 10 minutes. With this you will make sure that for every customer the waiting score is 0. Look at the customer's order.  Give them a different kind of sausage from what they actually want. If they want normal sausage, put Italian sausage on the griller. If they want Italian sausage, start grilling a normal one. It doesn't matter what type it is, it just has to be a different one to what the customer ordered. Take off the sausage straight away making sure it is raw. Eww! Put the sausage you just took off the griller in a bun. Again, the bun has to be a different one to what the customer ordered in order to get 0 points. The hot dog will now go to the build station. Here just press next, don't put anything as a topping.  With the drink if the customer ordered a fizzo, give them nothing. If they didn't order anything, give them a fizzo (doesn't matter what size). Do the same for the popcorn.
